snippet.title: Linkito / pre-alpha trailer
snippet.description:
Steam page : https://store.steampowered.com/app/2312770/Linkito/
Get involved & Win a key : join the discord https://discord.gg/WfsH2DvbUZ

Unleash your mind's potential with Linkito, a thrilling puzzle game! Get ready to immerse yourself in a world of challenging brain teasers. The latest trailer for version 0.4 is finally here. So sit back, grab a drink, and let the calming yet challenging gameplay of Linkito take over. Are you ready to put your problem-solving skills to the test? 

#Linkito #ChillPuzzles #Version0.4

Music credit : Bio Unit - Hitting the Wall
